scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm run env:prepare && pnpm -C backend install && pnpm -C backend prisma:generate && pnpm -C backend prisma:migrate && pnpm -C frontend install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "pnpm -C backend start:dev" "pnpm -C frontend dev"
scripts.start: pnpm run setup && pnpm run dev
